amendment.description: To provide for S corporation reform and simplification, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 625 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 625 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S6451-6456) To provide for S corporation reform and simplification, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 625 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 625 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Hatch.
